content.question: The excerpt best reflects which of the following changes to United States society compared to previous periods?

choices.label: The decline of segregationist policies in public spaces
The resistance to labor organization by corporations
The growth of a consumer culture that emphasized leisure time
The increased importance of defense industries after the First World War

content.answer: The growth of a consumer culture that emphasized leisure time

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
